column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////My husband and I stopped by while we were in town for a few days. There was a long line
column2: but we heard such great things
column3: we decided to wait. It was well worth the wait! I had the red velvet pancakes and they were AMAZING. I thought I was going to be having dessert for breakfast
column4: but it wasn't overly sweet. My husband had the Mexicana Skillet. It was packed with flavor (the chorizo made the dish) and he enjoyed every last bite! Highly recommend it.
